For the proper functioning of the site, it is sometimes necessary to place small data files, called Cookies, on your device.

What are cookies?

Cookies are small text files that websites store on your computer or mobile device when you start using these sites. This way, the site remembers your preferences and the actions you take on them (such as login information, language, font size, and other display preferences), so you don't have to re-enter the information when you jump from one page to another, but only for a certain amount of time.

We use Cookies to improve and promote the covid.gov.cz website. We do not send the content of viewed websites. It is not possible to identify a specific user through any third party Cookie.

  • Application insights (name of Cookies: ai_user, ai_session) is used to collect statistics on website usage.The Cookie stores a unique anonymous identifier to identify users when they repeatedly visit. Description on how Application insights work.
  • Google Analytics for traffic analysis. You can read about the conditions of using Google Analytics here.
